definition: impressive in appearance, a titled peer of the realm
details:
adjective
- impressive in appearance
= synonyms: stately
- having or showing or indicative of high or elevated character
= example: having or showing or indicative of high or elevated character
- of or belonging to or constituting the hereditary aristocracy especially as derived from feudal times
= example: of or belonging to or constituting the hereditary aristocracy especially as derived from feudal times
- chemically inert, especially toward oxygen
= example: chemically inert, especially toward oxygen
noun
- a titled peer of the realm
= synonyms: Lord, nobleman
